name: match tags
description: match tags inside html tags and ignore the letter case
content:
So, to sum up your own appearance:
  • Your hair must be neat and tidy.
  • You may be restricted on how your hair can look depending on the hotel.
  • For men, facial hair must be kept tidy at all times.
  • As the manager, you will often wear a suit.
  • You must look tidy and respectable at all times.
  • Even your footwear must be clean at all times.
  • There may be restrictions on the amount of jewellery that can be worn.
  • Having body art may not be allowed unless it can be hidden.
author: hassan ahmad
